// Import ToyHeader Component via its path relative to App.js import ToyHeader from "./components/ToyHeader"; import Toys from "./toys" /* Outline - Take HTML from Toy Tales lab and turn it into JSX - https://github.com/learn-co-curriculum/phase-1-challenge-toy-tale/blob/master/index.html - What needs to change? What's the same? - Refactor HTML into separate components - JSX Syntax - Pass in props Exercise - create a ToyCard component - start by hard-coding the JSX in your component return statement - then use props to make your component reusable - you can copy/paste data from the toys.js file as props - as a bonus, try importing data from the toys.js file */ function App() { return
{/* ToyHeader.js Component */} {/* Container.js (Component) */}
{/* AddToyForm.js Component */}

Create a toy!

{/* AddToyInput.js Component */}

{/* AddToyButton.js Commponent */}

} export default App;
